name: Sand Washing Machine
overview: Sand washing machine can also be called sand washer. They are designed& produced to clean sand particles and improve the quality or grade of particles. SBM ‘s XSD series sand washing machine and LSX series sand washing machine fully satisfy the marketing demands.
feature: High capacity and less of fine products &High washing-cleanliness
Easy to operate & Easy to maintain for its simple structure
Transmission bearings depart from water and material, avoiding being eroded
application: Sand washer is designed to clean natural-sand & artificial-sand, improving the quality of sand. But now it is also widely used in cleaning glass, chemical materials and some other materials that need to be cleaned in industrial production.
